summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Netflix Household Email Automation app. All core features working correctly including role-based access (Admin vs Guest), authentication, email account management, monitoring controls, and API endpoints.
passed_tests: Backend API - All 26 endpoints tested successfully (100% pass rate)
Guest access to Email History page with filter functionality
Admin Dashboard with monitoring controls and stats
Settings page with email account management
Email History filter by type (all, household_update, temporary_access)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor logout selector issue resolved)
